keyMoments.title: General Franky Debut
keyMoments.description: Franky reveals his ultimate post-timeskip creation, General Franky, during the battle at Gyoncorde Plaza.
keyMoments.significance: Showcases the crew's technological advancement and Franky's growth after two years of training.

keyMoments.title: Luffy Confronts Hody Jones
keyMoments.description: Luffy reaches and confronts the leader of the New Fishman Pirates, marking the beginning of the final battle.
keyMoments.significance: The crew's captain engages the arc's main antagonist directly.

keyMoments.title: Daruma's Underground Attack
keyMoments.description: Officer Daruma uses his abilities to create underground tunnels and collapse the ground beneath the Straw Hats.
keyMoments.significance: Demonstrates the crew officers' combat tactics and abilities.

keyMoments.title: Hody's Blackmail Exposed
keyMoments.description: Hody's method of controlling Surume through blackmail and hostage-taking is revealed.
keyMoments.significance: Exposes the crew's ruthless methods and leads to the loss of their Kraken ally.
